content: originally available as part of the tiny ami 2 set this pattern was later released for free from the designer when i was little i used to collect stationary and the japanese ones were my favorite here is a whole crochet pattern set not the actual toys inspired by them what s cuter than giving a smiley face to something that doesn t have it **additional materials** - 4 mm plastic eyes - felt for cheeks **tiny ami 2 set** - mushroom http //www ravelry com/patterns/show/mushroom - cafe con leche mug http //www ravelry com/patterns/show/cafe-con-leche-mug - cupcake http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cupcake-4 - fried egg http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/fried-egg - donut - ice cream cone - cactus http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cactus/
